TopicTitle: [PLUGIN] dodADA - Advanced Descent Assistant alphav6 for KSP .14

Articles.Content:
Until the throttle control becomes more precise I\'ll continue to use this tool.

I had a suggestion on the plug-in thread where you would type in a value and the engines would throttle exactly to that percent... Of course... Nobody made it..
The dodADAalphav6.zip attachment in the OP didn\'t survive the server move

This looks brilliant. I need it for super efficient mun designs. I downloaded, tried unzipping it, but it said it was broken or something. Please fix it, whatever\'s wrong with it. Pwetty please. I neeed it.

This looks brilliant. I need it for super efficient mun designs. I downloaded, tried unzipping it, but it said it was broken or something. Please fix it, whatever\'s wrong with it. Pwetty please. I neeed it.

same here. I downloaded it and it won\'t unzip for some reason. I tried on 2 different computers even.

Hey, dodrian, I have a problem when I tried to open this ZIP folder 'dodADAalphav6.zip'. I always get this error 'C:\Users oel\Desktop\New folder\dodADAalphav6.zip: Unexpected end of archive'. And when I tried to extract it, I got another different error! C:\Users oel\Desktop\New folder\dodADAalphav6.zip: The archive is corrupt

! C:\Users oel\Desktop\New folder\dodADAalphav6.zip: The archive is corrupt

Can you fix this error????PLZ!!!!??!?!!
